name: Stickman Nightmare (Scratch3 Horror)
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A HORROR GAME. IF YOU GET SCARED EASILY, DO NOT PLAY. 

 As per usual, you wanted a job. Matt's Marvellous Diner was hiring a nightguard, to take care of the place. To do tasks and keep the mascots Clean and Serene! However. This place has a dark secret, and its not what it seems. Something's lurking in the darkness, and you will find out soon who is lurking.

All credit goes to BroStudios as we (BlazedYoutube and CapLan) Made all sprites and models.

Static is an asset from FNaF (Credit Scott Cawthon and SteelWool Studios)

Music is from FNaF3

Sprites by BroStudios

Idea from FNaF

BlazedYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZrmD6Ne57APmYDAAMRBahw

Caplan: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaMqjPRrI7yJdm5ep9cd5dw

Scott Cawthon: https://twitter.com/real_scawthon

SteelWool: https://twitter.com/SteelWoolStudio
